sense.def:
Izraz
‘sorry’
ali
‘I'm sorry’
uporabljamo kot opravičilo za nekaj, kar smo naredili.

cit.quote: oprostite, žal mi je, opravičujem se

seg.quote: ‘You're giving me a headache with all that noise.’—‘Sorry.’
Sorry about the coffee on your bedspread.
I'm sorry if I worried you.

sense.def:
Izraz
sorry
uporabimo, kadar želimo reči, da nekomu ne moremo pomagati ali kadar mu moramo sporočiti slabo novico.

seg.quote: I'm sorry but there's no-one here called Nikki.
I'm sorry to say that the experiment has failed.

sense.def:
Izraz
sorry
uporabimo tudi, kadar nismo slišali tistega, kar je nekdo rekel, zato bi radi, da tisto ponovi.

seg.quote: ‘Have you seen the guide book anywhere?’—‘Sorry?’—‘Seen the guide book?’

sense.def:
To be sorry about a situation
pomeni biti žalosten ali razočaran zaradi nečesa ali obžalovati nekaj.

seg.quote: He was sorry he had agreed to stay.

sense.def:
To be sorry for someone
pomeni, da se nam nekdo smili, ker je nesrečen ali v neprijetnem položaju.

seg.quote: I knew they were having a rough time and I felt sorry for them.
‘We are in a sorry state,’ she lamented.
